name.full_name: Hindustan Institute of Technology and Science

Establishment of School of Liberal Arts
Introduction of AI & Data Science programs

btech_cse_ai.name: B.Tech CSE (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)

research_centers.name: Center for AI and Machine Learning

electronics_and_communication.name: Department of Electronics and Communication Engineering

research_centers.name: Center for VLSI and Embedded Systems

electrical_and_electronics.name: Department of Electrical and Electronics Engineering

mechanical_engineering.name: Department of Mechanical Engineering
mechanical_engineering.vision: To be a center of excellence in mechanical engineering education and research

civil_engineering.name: Department of Civil Engineering
civil_engineering.vision: To be a leading center for civil engineering education and sustainable infrastructure development

management.name: School of Management
management.vision: To develop global business leaders through excellence in management education and research

law.name: School of Law
law.vision: To nurture legal professionals with strong ethical foundations and global perspective

accreditation.bar_council: Approved by Bar Council of India

architecture.name: School of Architecture
architecture.vision: To create innovative architects who shape sustainable built environments

science.name: School of Science
science.vision: To foster scientific thinking and research excellence in basic sciences

liberal_arts.name: School of Liberal Arts and Humanities
liberal_arts.vision: To nurture critical thinking and creative expression through interdisciplinary learning

ba_liberal_arts.name: Bachelor of Arts in Liberal Arts

phd.name: Ph.D in Humanities and Social Sciences

research_centers.name: Center for Psychology and Human Behavior

research_institutions: Indian Council of Social Science Research

eligibility.management: Graduation with 60% and valid CAT/MAT score

rules: Below 75% leads to detention from examinations

overview.vision: To foster global academic excellence through international partnerships and collaborations

need_based.name: Financial Aid Scholarship
need_based.criteria: Family income below 5 Lakhs per annum

rules: Below 75% leads to detention from examinations

need_based.name: Financial Aid Scholarship
need_based.criteria: Family income below 5 Lakhs per annum

user_responsibilities: Protect user account from unauthorized users

enforcement.consequences: Right to permanently seize devices and/or initiate disciplinary action

key_points: Students with disciplinary actions not eligible
Students with many arrears not eligible

general_rules: Ragging strictly prohibited
Daily attendance after 6:30 PM
No day scholars allowed
Return by 5:30 PM on outing days
Visitors allowed only on weekends/holidays (9 AM - 5 PM)
Study hours 9 PM to 10:30 PM
specific_rules: Return by 7 PM weekdays, 8 PM weekends

communication_rules: Maintain professionalism - no personal email IDs for official communication
Use only official mail IDs for online meetings and internships
No sharing of official mail passwords
Google Drive access restricted to authorized personnel

permitted_usage: During workshops/seminars if required by resource person
rules: Mobile phones must remain in silent mode within premises

general_rules: No malpractice - severe penalties including paper cancellation
Must bring Hall Tickets and ID Cards
Books and bags outside examination hall
Occupy seats 10 minutes before exam
No entry after 30 minutes of exam start
Maintain silence
Bring own stationery - no exchange allowed
Cell phones banned
Write only registration number on question papers
Exit permitted only in last 30 minutes

review.eligibility: Only for students with answer script photocopies
process: HoD forwarded appeal within 5 days of revaluation results
Must include valued script and fee payment proof

requirements: Mandatory yearly Comprehensive Health Fitness Report

admission_rules: Fresh application required each academic year
Students with disciplinary actions not eligible
Students with many arrears not eligible
Management reserves right to refuse admission
general_rules: Daily attendance after 6:30 PM
No leaving room after attendance
Behave with dignity and decency
No staying in hostel during college hours without permission
No day scholars allowed
Return by 5:30 PM on outing days
Visitors allowed only in lobby area
No valuables like gold, excess cash allowed
Mobile phones prohibited in academic blocks
Cybercrime leads to immediate expulsion

regulations: No entry into kitchen except Warden and Committee Members
Decent dress code in dining hall

facilities: Campus Clinic with Doctors and Ambulance

anti_ragging.definition: Any conduct causing annoyance, hardship, psychological harm or fear to freshmen/junior students

verses:
Pride of the land, haven of hope with her banner
Flying aloft;
Stands Hindustan greeting all
Shining at the zenith of glory.

Peace and harmony dwell
Goodwill and friendship prevail;
Millions seek thy portals
Make thy name immortal.

institution_info.location: Padur, 22 kms South of Chennai on Rajiv Gandhi Salai (OMR)
institution_info.campus: 100 acres green campus extending from OMR to Muttukadu lake

ragging_policy.definition: Any conduct whether by words spoken or written or by an act that has the effect of teasing, treating or handling with rudeness any other student

kcg_memorial.name: Dr. K. C. G. Verghese Memorial Foundation Scholarship/Aid

types.merit: Toppers in Higher Secondary Examination and HITSEEE
types.merit_cum_means: Special financial assistance for differently-abled and economically weaker sections

research.name: Hindustan Teaching Research Fellowship (HTRF)
research.eligibility: Full-time Research Scholars registered for Ph.D
